pullrequest.title: new head textures (no changes to kinematics or collision).

content.raw:
what if we turn up ambient and emission?

~~~
hg diff
diff -r a0904f2b4f52 ros/multisense_sl_description/meshes/head.dae
--- a/ros/multisense_sl_description/meshes/head.dae	Mon May 06 12:30:42 2013 -0700
+++ b/ros/multisense_sl_description/meshes/head.dae	Mon May 06 14:24:25 2013 -0700
@@ -31,10 +31,10 @@
         <technique sid="standard">
           <phong>
             <emission>
-              <color sid="emission">0.000000  0.000000 0.000000 1.000000</color>
+              <color sid="emission">0.800000  0.800000 0.800000 1.000000</color>
             </emission>
             <ambient>
-              <color sid="ambient">0.588235  0.588235 0.588235 1.000000</color>
+              <color sid="ambient">1.000000  1.000000 1.000000 1.000000</color>
             </ambient>
             <diffuse>
               <texture texture="Map #4-image" texcoord="CHANNEL0">
diff -r a0904f2b4f52 ros/multisense_sl_description/meshes/head_camera.dae
--- a/ros/multisense_sl_description/meshes/head_camera.dae	Mon May 06 12:30:42 2013 -0700
+++ b/ros/multisense_sl_description/meshes/head_camera.dae	Mon May 06 14:24:25 2013 -0700
@@ -31,10 +31,10 @@
         <technique sid="standard">
           <phong>
             <emission>
-              <color sid="emission">0.000000  0.000000 0.000000 1.000000</color>
+              <color sid="emission">0.800000  0.800000 0.800000 1.000000</color>
             </emission>
             <ambient>
-              <color sid="ambient">0.588235  0.588235 0.588235 1.000000</color>
+              <color sid="ambient">1.000000  1.000000 1.000000 1.000000</color>
             </ambient>
             <diffuse>
               <texture texture="Map #4-image" texcoord="CHANNEL0">
~~~

see [snapshot](#!/osrf/drcsim/issue-attachment/250/osrf/drcsim/1367875371.67/250/Screenshot%20from%202013-05-06%2014:23:07.png)
